agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.p1: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of MyAgentWebsite.com (the "Service"), operated by MyAgentWebsite.com ("we", "us", or "our").
agreement.p2: By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these Terms, you may not access the Service.

description.title: Description of Service
description.intro: MyAgentWebsite.com provides a comprehensive website building platform and API specifically designed for real estate agents and agencies. The Service allows users to:
features: Create and manage professional real estate websites
Access a backoffice admin panel for content management
Publish individual property listings and entire property developments
Manage a centralized photo library for property images
Collect and manage newsletter subscribers with CSV export
Use preview mode to review changes before publishing
Capture leads through contact forms and newsletter signups
Access a full REST API for custom integrations (Developer plan)
Connect custom domains (Professional and Enterprise plans)
Receive hosting, maintenance, and support (Professional and Enterprise plans)

requirements.title: Account Requirements
requirements.intro: To use the Service, you must:
items: Provide accurate and complete registration information
Maintain the security of your account credentials
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

security.title: Account Security
security.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account password, backoffice credentials, and API keys (if applicable). You must not share your credentials with unauthorized parties. You are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your account. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account or security breach.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.intro: We offer multiple subscription plans and one-time services with different features and pricing:
plans: Developer Plan: €199/month - Full API and backoffice access (you host your own frontend)
Professional Plan: €499/month - Complete managed solution with hosting, maintenance, and support
Enterprise Plan: Custom pricing - Multiple websites, white-label options, and dedicated support
One-Time Design + Build Services: Starting at €2,000 for design or €3,500 for build (separate from monthly subscriptions)
pricing.changes: Pricing is subject to change with 30 days' notice to current subscribers. One-time service pricing may change without notice for new customers.

terms.title: Payment Terms
terms.content: Monthly subscriptions are billed in advance on a recurring basis. One-time design and build services require 50% payment upfront and 50% upon completion. Payment must be made by credit card, bank transfer, or other accepted payment methods. By providing payment information, you authorize us to charge the applicable fees. All payments are processed securely through Stripe.

trial.title: Free Trial
trial.content: We may offer a 14-day free trial. At the end of the trial period, your subscription will automatically convert to a paid subscription unless you cancel before the trial ends.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.content: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for new monthly subscriptions. Refund requests must be made within 14 days of the initial purchase. Refunds are not available for subscription renewals or one-time design/build services after work has commenced. If you paid for design/build services, the completed work remains your property even if you cancel your monthly subscription.

byUser.title: Cancellation by User
byUser.content: You may cancel your monthly subscription at any time by providing 30 days' notice through your account settings or by contacting us. Cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing period after the 30-day notice. You will continue to have access to the Service until the end of the paid period. We recommend exporting your newsletter subscribers (CSV), property data, and downloading photos from your photo library before cancellation.

byUs.title: Termination by Us
byUs.intro: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you:
reasons: Engage in fraudulent or illegal activities

data.title: Data After Termination
data.content: Upon termination, your property listings, photo library, blog posts, testimonials, and newsletter subscribers will be retained for 30 days to allow for potential account reactivation. After 30 days, all data will be permanently deleted from our systems (backups may retain data for up to 90 days). You are responsible for exporting all data you wish to retain, including newsletter subscribers (CSV export), property listings, and photos, before the 30-day retention period expires. If you purchased design/build services, you retain ownership of that work regardless of subscription status.

yours.title: Your Content
yours.content: You retain all ownership rights to the content you upload to the Service, including property listings, property developments, photos in your photo library, blog posts, testimonials, newsletter subscriber data, and any other materials ("User Content"). If you purchased design/build services, you own the resulting website design and code.

license.title: License to Us
license.content: By uploading User Content, you grant us a limited, non-exclusive, worldwide license to use, store, display, and transmit your content solely for the purpose of providing the Service. This includes displaying your property listings on your website, storing photos in your photo library, managing newsletter subscribers, and generating preview mode links. This license terminates when you delete the content or terminate your account.

responsibility.title: Content Responsibility
responsibility.content: You are solely responsible for your User Content and must ensure you have all necessary rights, licenses, and permissions, including rights to property photos and testimonials. You represent that you have proper authorization to list properties and use associated images. You agree not to upload content that is illegal, infringing, defamatory, obscene, misleading, or otherwise objectionable.

acceptable.intro: You agree not to use the Service, backoffice, or API to:

resolution.content: In the event of any dispute, you agree to first contact us to seek resolution informally. If the dispute cannot be resolved informally, it shall be resolved through binding arbitration or in the courts of Portugal.
